headline: Is U.S. Bancorp (USB) Still Attractive After Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Gains
summary: Wondering whether U.S. Bancorp at around US$56 a share still offers value, or if most of the easy gains are already on the table. The stock has posted returns of 1.2% over the last week, 5.2% over the past month, 4.0% year to date and 22.6% over the last year, with a 31.3% three year return and 50.0% over five years. Recently, much of the attention around large U.S. banks has centered on interest rate expectations, capital requirements and regulatory updates that affect how investors think...

headline: U.S. Bancorp Leadership Shift Centers On Kedia As Chairman And CEO
summary: U.S. Bancorp (NYSE:USB) announced that CEO Gunjan Kedia has been appointed Chairman, succeeding Andrew Cecere. Longtime chairman Andrew Cecere is retiring from the board as part of the leadership transition. Chief Operations Officer Souheil Badran is retiring, prompting further changes in the senior leadership team. For investors watching one of the largest U.S. regional banks, these leadership shifts put fresh attention on U.S. Bancorp's long term direction. The shares most recently closed...
